channel.title: KingsCast Hockey Podcast
channel.description: The Podcast for LA Kings Fans, by LA Kings fans. This comedic, sometimes critical, but always informative hockey podcast takes a look at the Los Angeles Kings, its players and fan base.
channel.itunes:summary: The Podcast for LA Kings Fans, by LA Kings fans. This comedic, sometimes critical, but always informative hockey podcast takes a look at the Los Angeles Kings, its players and fan base.
channel.itunes:author: Keith Korneluk & Chris Kaliszewski

item.title: 3rd Annual Season Finale
item.itunes:subtitle: May 7, 2009 - 3rd Annual Season Finale
item.itunes:summary: That time of year is here again. It's the eagerly awaited, highly anticipated season finale for Season 3 of the KingsCast Hockey Podcast. In epic fashion, KingsCast gets the band back together with Keith Korneluk returning to the show, joining Chris Kaliszewski and Connie Kim. In this dynamic and unpredictable episode, we talk about the end of the Kings season, hand out some hardware in the annual "KingsCast Award Show", and discuss the pending off-season. This show is real!
item.author: kingscast@gmail.com
item.itunes:author: Keith Korneluk Chris Kaliszewski Connie Kim
item.itunes:keywords: KingsCast, Tip A King, Chris Kaliszewski, Keith Korneluk, Staples Center, Patrick O'Sullivan, NHL, Anaheim Ducks, Dustin Brown, LA Kings, Toyota Sports Center, Staples Center

item.title: In the Chase
item.itunes:subtitle: March 19, 2009 - In the Chase
item.itunes:summary: KingsCast is back in full effect as the Kings season winds down in familiar fashion. Connie Kim from 'A Queen Among Kings' again fills in for the traveling Keith Korneluk. In this episode we discuss the season up to now, review the Patrick O'Sullivan trade and give him a traditional send off with a new "See Ya" segment, talk about various elements of the Kings organization and ponder the mysterious in "Where's Keith?" Enjoy!
item.author: kingscast@gmail.com
item.itunes:author: Keith Korneluk Chris Kaliszewski & Connie Kim
item.itunes:keywords: Los Angeles Kings, LA Kings, Staples Center, Chris Kaliszewski, Kings hockey, Patrick O'Sullivan, Keith Korneluk, Connie Kim, Manchester Monarchs

item.title: Tip A King 2009
item.itunes:subtitle: February 23, 2009 - Tip A King 2009
item.itunes:summary: In this Special Edition KingsCast Episode, Chris covers the Kings annual charity event, makes various witty live observations, engages in real life conversations with players and staff and hustles for shoutouts and sound bites. Enjoy!
item.author: kingscast@gmail.com
item.itunes:author: Keith Korneluk & Chris Kaliszewski
item.itunes:keywords: KingsCast, Tip A King, Chris Kaliszewski, Keith Korneluk, Staples Center, Patrick O;Sullivan

item.title: Road Warriors
item.itunes:subtitle: February 20, 2009 - Road Warriors
item.itunes:summary: The Kings have been playing playoff hockey on the road and coming out on top. LA hockey is finally receiving national attention. In this episode we'll analyze the games up to now, get the female take on the team with a special guest host and give a little send-off to one of our regulars.
item.author: kingscast@gmail.com
item.itunes:author: Keith Korneluk Chris Kaliszewski & Connie Kim
item.itunes:keywords: Los Angeles Kings, LA Kings, hockey, NHL, KingsCast Hockey Podcast, Anze Kopitar, Drew Doughty, Alexander Frolov, Jack Johnson, Jonathan Quick

item.title: The Descent
item.itunes:subtitle: January 23, 2009 - The Descent
item.itunes:summary: Matt "the Sound Guy" had the flu and jury duty this week making this episode's game analysis now irrelevant. Sorry folks. However, there's lots of goodies in this show for you to enjoy. In this episode we'll analyze the team up to now, discuss the World Junior Championships, present our Fan Experience on-location assignments, profile forward Jarret Stoll, introduce a new rant segment called "Where's the O?" and give a proper farewell to an old chum in a classic "See Ya" piece. So, enjoy the show... and suck it haters.
item.author: kingscast@gmail.com
item.itunes:author: Keith Korneluk & Chris Kaliszewski
item.itunes:keywords: KingsCast, Los Angeles Kings, LA Kings, Kings, NHL, hockey, KingsCast Hockey Podcast, Anze Kopitar, Drew Doughty, Jack Johnson, Dustin Brown

item.title: Holiday Spectacular
item.itunes:subtitle: December 25, 2008 - Holiday Spectacular
item.itunes:summary: On this Christmas morning, Santa has come and brought you a brand new episode of KingsCast! In this episode we'll analyze the team up to now, give some gifts to the team, tell you a few of our favorite things and profile defenseman Denis Gauthier
item.author: kingscast@gmail.com
item.itunes:author: Keith Korneluk & Chris Kaliszewski
item.itunes:keywords: hockey, nhl, los angeles kings, la kings, wayne gretzky

item.title: High and Wide
item.itunes:subtitle: December 13, 2008 - High and Wide
item.itunes:summary: In this episode we'll analysze the games up to now, bring back the old classic segment "Throw Out Some Numbers," profile defenseman Matt Greene, update you on some former players in a "How's that One Guy Doin?" bit and we'll discuss the new 3rd jersey. So, let's grip it and rip it, KingsCast is on!
item.author: kingscast@gmail.com
item.itunes:author: Keith Korneluk & Chris Kaliszewski
item.itunes:keywords: Los Angeles Kings, LA Kings, NHL, hockey, Stanley Cup, Anze Kopitar, Drew Doughty, Kyle Quincey, Terry Murray, Dean Lombardi, National Hockey League

item.title: Back in the Saddle
item.itunes:subtitle: November 24, 2008 - Back in the Saddle
item.itunes:summary: The Kings are out of the cellar, fresh off a little win streak and beginning to resemble an NHL team for the first time in three years. It's starting to be fun to be a Kings fan. In this episode we'll analyze the games up to now, talk about what's ticking us off lately, profile Kings rookie Wayne Simmonds, discuss Terry Murray's line combinations and give our Thanks for the holiday season, KingsCast style.
item.author: kingscast@gmail.com
item.itunes:author: Keith Korneluk & Chris Kaliszewski
item.itunes:keywords: los angeles kings, la kings, hockey, nhl, wayne gretzky, stanley cup, anze kopitar, jack johnson, drew doughty

item.title: Obstructed View
item.itunes:subtitle: November 15, 2008 - Obstructed View
item.itunes:summary: In a triumphant return, it's KingsCast... Season 3, Episode 3 entitled "Obstructed View." In this installment we analyze the games up to now, discuss "What's New at Staples?", profile rookie forward Oscar Moller, present the new Kings Fan Experiences and finally respond to some mailbag inquires. Now take a seat as KC rocks the mic.
item.author: kingscast@gmail.com
item.itunes:author: Keith Korneluk & Chris Kaliszewski
item.itunes:keywords: Los Angeles Kings, LA Kings, NHL, AHL, hockey, Drew Doughty, Ontario Reign, Bernier, Moller, Staples Center, Downtown, Stanley Cup, Manchester Monarchs, Wayne Gretzky, Luc Robitaille, Rob Blake, Anze Kopitar, Jack Johnson, Dustin Brown

item.title: The Next Phase
item.itunes:subtitle: October 11, 2008 - The Next Phase
item.itunes:summary: On the eve of the season opener, KingsCast returns with Season 3, Episode 2 - The Next Phase. In this episode, we re-cap the pre-season, talk about our experience at Frozen Fury, discuss our goalie situation and present a brand new installment of "Mock the Slogan". It's time for hockey!
item.author: kingscast@gmail.com
item.itunes:author: Keith Korneluk & Chris Kaliszewski
item.itunes:keywords: KingsCast Hockey Podcast, KingsCast, Los Angeles Kings, LA Kings, Stanley Cup, NHL, Patrick O'Sullivan, Wayne Gretzky, Anze Kopitar, Drew Doughty

item.title: Back in Black (and Purple)
item.itunes:subtitle: September 15, 2008 - Back in Black (and Purple)
item.itunes:summary: KingsCast is back with the premier of Season 3. As the long offseason winds down, KingsCast checks in with a "quick check" of what happened during the offseason, open up the dusty mailbag and present a few "things to watch for" in the 2008-2009 season.
item.author: kingscast@gmail.com
item.itunes:author: Keith Korneluk & Chris Kaliszewski
item.itunes:keywords: Los Angeles Kings, LA Kings, NHL, Hockey, Kings, Wayne Gretzky, Anze Kopitar, Dean Lombardi, Rob Blake, KingsKast

item.title: Prospect Preview
item.itunes:subtitle: May 6, 2008 - Prospect Preview
item.itunes:summary: After a solid month of watching the playoffs yet again from the outside looking in, we decided it was time for another installment. In this episode we discuss the upcoming draft, talk about the top prospects, break down the goalie pipeline, look at what might happen this summer and say our goodbyes. So, soak it all up Kings Nation, KingsCast is hear to inform and pontificate, yet again.
item.author: kingscast@gmail.com
item.itunes:author: Keith Korneluk & Chris Kaliszewski
item.itunes:keywords: Los Angeles Kings, LA Kings, NHL, AHL, hockey, Stanley Cup, Manchester Monarchs, Wayne Gretzky, Luc Robitaille, Rob Blake, Anze Kopitar, Jack Johnson, Dustin Brown

item.title: 2nd Annual Season Finale
item.itunes:subtitle: April 27, 2008 - 2nd Annual Season Finale
item.itunes:summary: It's the end of the road for the Los Angeles Kings and KingsCast celebrates the end with our second annual Season Finale. In this episode we analyze the final games of the season, talk about the NHL Draft lottery, conduct our awards show and say goodbye to a few "treasured" players. Sit back and enjoy!
item.author: kingscast@gmail.com

item.itunes:summary: The season is rapidly coming to a close and KingsCast returns with Episode 12, "Traded, For Parts". In this episode we analyze the games up to now, give our thoughts and analysis on the trade deadline as well as what we thought of Tip A King.

item.itunes:summary: At long last, it's episode 9, "Guaranteed Sellers." In this installment we recap the games up to now, update you on past/current prospects and players in a segment called "How's That One Guy Doing?" and we'll celebrate a milestone in KingsCast history.

item.title: Christmas Extravaganza
item.itunes:subtitle: December 25, 2007 - Christmas Extravaganza
item.itunes:summary: It's Christmas morning in LA and KingsCast brings you tidings of great joy. The perfect stocking stuffer - the Second Annual Christmas Special! In this episode, we re-cap the games up to now, present the LA Kings with a few Christmas gifts, interview HockeyBuzz blogger Carla Muller and stuff in more Christmas songs than you could possibly imagine. Feliz Navidad!

item.title: LA is on Fire
item.itunes:subtitle: Wednesday October 24, 2007 - LA is on Fire
item.itunes:summary: KingsCast is back with Episode 5: "LA is on Fire!"...The Kings are doing something unprecedented this season...winning! In this episode, we re-cap the games up to now, say goodbye to a future star of the organization and play a little game we like to call "If I Were..." Enjoy!
item.description: Wednesday October 24, 2007 - LA is on Fire

item.title: A Long Road Ahead
item.itunes:subtitle: October 15, 2007 - A Long Road Ahead
item.itunes:summary: KingsCast presents for you, Episode 24: A Long Road Ahead. In this episode we re-cap the games until now, talk about the success of our charity event "High Tea With Kings" and re-play a little game we like to call "Throw Out Some Numbers", redux. So sit back and enjoy this new ditty..

item.title: Pre-season Observations
item.itunes:subtitle: September 20, 2007 - Pre-season Observations
item.itunes:summary:
In this episode, we re-cap the first two games of the pre-season against our cross-town rival Ducks, plug our charity event, discuss our goaltending situation and talk about our new slogan.
Don't forget to join us on Saturday, September 29th at 9AM PST in Century City for "High Tea With Kings" watch party where we'll see the Kings take on the Ducks in London. Courtesy of Budweiser and the KingsCast Hockey Podcast.
Don't forget to leave us a voicemail at (206) 202-2311.
item.author: kingscast@gmail.com
item.itunes:author: Keith Korneluk & Chris Kaliszewski
item.itunes:keywords: la kings, los angeles kings, kings, los angeles, nhl, hockey, sports, anaheim ducks, ducks

item.title: Offseason Musings
item.itunes:subtitle: September 2, 2007 - Offseason Musings
item.itunes:summary: Take a break from the intense Labor Day heat, pour yourself a Ketel One and Lemonade, and enjoy a brand-new episode of KingsCast. In this episode, we talk about the most recent signings, talk about our upcoming charity event entitled "High Tea With the Kings", preview our new website and play the Nick-Name Game.
item.author: kingscast@gmail.com
item.itunes:author: Keith Korneluk & Chris Kaliszewski
item.itunes:keywords: la kings, los angeles kings, kings, hockey, nhl, sports, wayne gretzky

item.title: Season 2 Premier
item.itunes:subtitle: August 12, 2007 - Season 2 Premier
item.itunes:summary:
We've upgraded our recording studio to bring you listeners something that sounds a lot less like we recorded it in our parent's basement.
In this episode we offer a 20-minute preview of the upcoming season. Included are discussions about the off season acquisitions, the Ducks winning the Stanley Cup and a nice send off for a few former players KingsCast style.
item.author: kingscast@gmail.com
item.itunes:author: Keith Korneluk & Chris Kaliszewski
item.itunes:keywords: la kings, los angeles kings, kings, hockey, nhl, sports, wayne gretzky

item.title: Season Finale
item.itunes:subtitle: April 27, 2007 - Season Finale
item.itunes:summary: The sun has officially set on the '06-'07 season for the Los Angeles Kings. The coaches and GM are doing exit interviews, trying to figure out what went wrong (answer: Cloutier). The players are getting good tee-times. In this episode we re-cap the final game against Phoenix, profile new Monarch Brian Boyle and give out a few awards to the team. So buckle yourselves in, as this car is about to die.
item.author: kingscast@gmail.com
item.itunes:author: Keith Korneluk & Chris Kaliszewski
item.itunes:keywords: la kings, los angeles kings, kings, hockey, nhl, sports, wayne gretzky

item.title: Kings to Jesters
item.itunes:subtitle: April 8, 2007 - Kings to Jesters
item.itunes:summary: That's right, as the season draws to a close, we bring you a very special 15th episode entitled "Kings to Jesters". In this episode we bring you our very first interview with Kings top prospect Patrick O'Sullivan, re-cap the games up to now, talk about next year's new slogan and profile the newest King Jack Johnson. So sit back and grab a drink as Keith and Chris get more toasted than a Scottish distiller… Thanks for listening!
item.author: kingscast@gmail.com
item.itunes:author: Keith Korneluk & Chris Kaliszewski
item.itunes:keywords: la kings, los angeles kings, kings, hockey, nhl, sports, wayne gretzky

item.title: St. Patrick's Day Bonanza
item.itunes:subtitle: March 18, 2007 - St. Patrick's Day Bonanza
item.itunes:summary:
We uncapped that special bottle of Jameson Irish Whiskey and drank away St. Patty's Day in the only way that KingsCast knows how: with the Kings.
In this episode we re-cap the games up to now, play the "If I Were..." game with an Irish twist, visit some of our now gone Kings and talk about our plans for the playoffs and off season.
So sit back, relax and nurse that hangover, Shamus, it's time to talk about Kings hockey!
item.author: kingscast@gmail.com
item.itunes:author: Keith Korneluk & Chris Kaliszewski
item.itunes:keywords: la kings, los angeles kings, kings, hockey, nhl, sports, wayne gretzky

item.title: Enter the Scrubs
item.itunes:subtitle: March 4, 2007 - Enter the Scrubs
item.itunes:summary:
What a better way to spend a lazy Sunday then listening to the latest Kings bitch-fest by Keith and Chris titled "Enter the Scrubs".
In this episode we re-cap the games up to now, talk about the moves made at the trade deadline, identify some of the new scrubs in a Kings uniform and try a little something we like to call "If only...". Don't forget to check out new shout-outs by Bob Miller and Jim Fox
item.author: kingscast@gmail.com
item.itunes:author: Keith Korneluk & Chris Kaliszewski
item.itunes:keywords: la kings, los angeles kings, kings, hockey, nhl, sports, wayne gretzky

item.title: Commitment to Excellence
item.itunes:subtitle: February 23, 2007 - Commitment to Excellence (in 2011)
item.itunes:summary: Keith and Chris return to the mic once again for the 12th episode of the season. In this episode, we re-cap the games up to now, discuss the Sean Avery trade, profile some of the newly acquired scrubs, open up the mailbag and play a little game we like to call "If I Were..."
item.author: kingscast@gmail.com
item.itunes:author: Keith Korneluk & Chris Kaliszewski
item.itunes:keywords: la kings, los angeles kings, kings, hockey, nhl, sports, wayne gretzky

item.title: Luc Robitaille Special
item.itunes:subtitle: February 4, 2007 - Luc Robitaille Special
item.itunes:summary:
On this Super Bowl Sunday, Keith lost $100 on the Bears but you win with a new episode of KingsCast: The Luc Robitaille Special. That's right, Keith and Chris finally re-cap Luc Robitaille's jersey retirement in Episode 11 (incidentally, they forgot to celebrate the historic 10th episode).
In this episode, we celebrate the career of "Lucky Luc", re-cap the games up to now and talk about the trade of Craig Conroy. Incidentally, Keith and Chris only mention "Cloutier" twice this episode.
item.author: kingscast@gmail.com
item.itunes:author: Keith Korneluk & Chris Kaliszewski
item.itunes:keywords: la kings, los angeles kings, kings, hockey, nhl, sports, wayne gretzky

item.title: The Cellar
item.itunes:subtitle: January 22, 2007 - The Cellar
item.itunes:summary: The Kings continue the nose-dive. In the first episode of 2007, we re-cap the games up to now, talk about the "Meet the Players Party" and "Breakfast with the GM". Lastly, we say goodbye and adieu to our old friend...Danny Boy Cloutier.
item.author: kingscast@gmail.com
item.itunes:author: Keith Korneluk & Chris Kaliszewski
item.itunes:keywords: la kings, los angeles kings, kings, hockey, nhl, sports, wayne gretzky

item.title: Christmas Special
item.itunes:subtitle: December 22, 2006 - Christmas Special
item.itunes:summary: A very special Christmas treat for the Kings and fans of KingsCast Nation. In this episode, we re-cap the games, profile Kings Head Coach Marc Crawford and give the Kings some KingsCast Christmas presents. Feliz Navidad!

item.title: Conspiracy at Staples
item.itunes:subtitle: December 6, 2007 - Conspiracy at Staples
item.itunes:summary:
After devouring the rest of the leftovers and experiencing the brief change in the weather, KingsCast is back with Episode 8 "Conspiracy at Staples".
In this episode Keith and Chris read the very first KingsCast expose' (or conspiracy theory, you decide), try out a new "numbers game", re-cap the games, talk even more shit than usual and introduce a possible new chant.
We had a lot of fun making this episode and we think you'll really enjoy it.
item.author: kingscast@gmail.com
